title: List of all Android appcompat  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android appcompat  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: AppCompat-Extension-Library
repoList.description: A library that builds on the AppCompat Design Library and provides additional common components such as AccountHeaderView, FloatingActionMenu, CircleImageView, Picker Dialogs, FlexibleToolbarLayout, Delightful Detail Drawables and TypefaceCompat.

repoList.name: NavigationView-Demo
repoList.description: Small sample using the components and features of Android Design Support Library

repoList.name: AndroidSupportLibrary
repoList.description: android support支持库for Eclipse，包含design v7包下面的appcompat、cardview、recyclerview等库的源码，不是jar包，使用Eclipse同学的福音。

repoList.name: themes-sample-android
repoList.description: Sample application that shows how to use themes with AndroidX AppCompat library

repoList.name: Corbind
repoList.description: Kotlin Coroutines binding APIs for Android UI widgets from the platform and support libraries

repoList.name: MaterialMenuDrawer
repoList.description: This App Project provides some code to implement a Navigation Drawer with Androids appcompat library v21 down to API Level 7. I will add more features soon. Enjoy and feel free to improve this code!

repoList.name: vector-drawable-tutorial
repoList.description: Android Vector Drawable Example using AppCompat Support Library :- http://www.androidtutorialshub.com/android-vector-drawable-example-using-appcompat-support-library/

repoList.name: pinview
repoList.description: Native, appcompat backed pin-view library for Android

repoList.name: appcompatv7
repoList.description: Android Compatibility Library

repoList.name: day-night-theme-tutorial
repoList.description: Android DayNight Theme Example using AppCompat support library:- http://www.androidtutorialshub.com/android-daynight-theme-example-using-appcompat-support-library/
